name: Just My Type!
description:
It has been a while since you have last been on a date. Thankfully your friend has set you up with someone just your type!

Your date wants to get to know you, so be yourself and say all your thoughts and feelings. Just be sure not to make mistakes along the way. Mistakes in how you speak may trigger your nerves which may hinder your ability to sweet talk your date. If you get too nervous she might notice and take an extra long bathroom break... Don't worry there's someone for everyone in this world and no one is truly alone!
